title: Jacket, from a two-piece set
description: pounded indigo jacket with two overlapping fronts; side vents with edging in green and cerise; embroidered and pieced horizontal stripes at bottom in green, pink, blue and gold metal; long sleeves with five narrow appliqued strips in rose, green, pink and purple; lined lower back panel with ornate embroidery in many styles and many colors on different-colored, pieces horizontal strips; sequin and metal strip trim
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
